tr.td: Catholic wins toss; defers. HSC gets ball first
Peter Rosa kickoff 54 yards to the HSC11, Matt DeMasi return 25 yards to the HSC36 (Mark Dimatteo).
Alec Cobb pass complete to Patrick Kline for 15 yards to the CUAFB49 (N. Della Jacono).
